title: Can you use a stylus on a laptop’s touchpad? - Quora

response.answer_text: A2A: You can use the cheap type that just simulates the capacitive effect of a fingertip. For a sophisticated stylus that senses pressure, you won’t have the proper receiver unless the laptop is a 2-in-1 and you are using a pressure sensitive stylus designed for its screen. In that case, it may or may not work depending on how the touchpad and stylus are implemented.
